column1: Something wonderful will happen today. Believe it!
You can do this!
You can do this thing called life. You've got this!
You are amazing. You can do anything. Choose to be positive. Know your worth. You will succeed!
You are a positive person and will continue to be a positive person no matter what happens today
You are worth it!
You are worthwhile!
You can trust yourself to make good choices
You can trust yourself to make the best decisions you can with the information you have
We are all a work in progress and you are OK!
You are doing your best. Be OK with that!
Choose love
If you feel overwhelmed breath deeply, step back and observe what is happening
You are strong!
You are worth listening to!
You are kind, you are loving, You are loveable!
You are enough!
You are enough, you are  more than enough, you are equal to anything you choose to be
Every day in every way you get better and better
You are having a positive and inspiring impact on the people you come into contact with every moment of every day
You are constantly growing and evolving into a better person
You are freeing yourself from all destructive doubt and fear
Note to yourself: You are going to make yourself so proud
Happiness is a choice. Today choose to be happy
You are embracing change seamlessly and rising to the new opportunies it presents
You have come farther than you would have ever thought possible, and you are learning along the way
Strive for joy, not for perfection
When you release shame, you move into yourself more beautifully
Every day in every way you can speak to yourself as a friend would
You are surrounded by abundance everywhere
You are a healthy, energetic and optimistic being
Allow yourself to overflow with happiness, joy and satisfaction
Your body is relaxed. Your mind is calm. Your soul is at peace
Everything you seek can be found within
